/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, gazing down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
